titleInfo.title: Water structure on gypsum (0-10) - MD simulation and experiment

mods.abstract: Interactive comparison of the results from force-field molecular dynamics calculations and atomic force microscopy. A web version of the visualization can be found [here](https://pc1.pages.ub.uni-bielefeld.de/pub/2021-Gypsum/gypsum.html).
